scripts.logos:copy: mkdir -p public/logos && cp src/logos/optimized/invisible-sloth-logo-technical-light.svg public/logos/logo-technical-light.svg && cp src/logos/optimized/invisible-sloth-logo-technical-dark.svg public/logos/logo-technical-dark.svg && cp src/logos/optimized/invisible-sloth-logo-light.svg public/logos/logo-standard-light.svg && cp src/logos/optimized/invisible-sloth-logo-dark.svg public/logos/logo-standard-dark.svg
scripts.logos:build: npm run logos:optimize && npm run logos:copy
